Dating: NEW KINGDOM (not before); LATE PERIOD (not after)
Name: Udjat-eye
Description: An udjat-eye made of light blue faience.The udjat-eye depicts an open human eye to which some extra elements have been added. The amulet is connected with the celestial deity in the shape of a falcon and therefore also with the king. It is one of the most popular amulets and was not just used in the funerary cult.
